response.original_title: We Don't Need No Education ( Hey Teacher, Leave Them Kids Alone )
response.overview: Jeanne is disillusioned with the education system and after watching a Pink Floyd movie finds that the only way to make a change is through revolution.
response.tagline: THE REVOLUTION WILL NOT BE TELEVISED
response.title: We Don't Need No Education ( Hey Teacher, Leave Them Kids Alone )
